name: framed-web-sdk
description: Onfido offers the [web SDK](https://github.com/onfido/onfido-sdk-ui) as an open source project on github. The web sdk is a library that can be bootstrapped with a set of parameters and renders a user interface to capture document and face  nformation from an applicant.

scripts.build:test: npm run build && npm run test-server:prepare && npm run test-server:build

author: Tony Findeisen
